nodes.text: Flight Officer was a rank in the Galactic Republic, Galactic Empire, and the Resistance. The rank was used by the Grand Army of the Republic during the Clone Wars. During the Battle of Umbara, a flight officer reported to Jedi General Pong Krell that three starfighters had been launched. Pilot Zin Graw of the 204th Imperial Fighter Wing held the rank of flight officer. In 34 ABY, the rank was held by Huetrin Jones, a member of the Resistance who was stationed at the Resistance base on D'Qar during their evacuation of the base.
